beer.beer_description: Grinch Juice isn't here to warm your heart - it's here to steal it. This cheeky Oat Cream IPA is loaded with creamy oats and lactose, then dosed with flaked coconut and pandan for a tropical green twist that even Whoville would fight over.

items.badge_description: Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 40 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%. Try 5 more for Level 9!

You may not be able to see through the haze, but that juicy, hoppy goodness goes down smooth. What started as a trend is here to stay. That's 10 different beers with the style of IPA - New England / Hazy, Pale Ale - New England / Hazy, IPA - Milkshake, or Pale Ale - Milkshake. Try 5 more for Level 3!

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 230 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 47! Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast
